About me

I am a passionate self-taught Front-end Web Developer. Skilled in using React.js, JavaScript/jquery, Express.js, REST API, Node.js and Bootstrap for styling in projects. I am interested in the creating projects that make difference for both the user and the businesses. I love learning about creative ways to beautify and strengthen websites and applications.

Some personal tech-related goals include:
Adding Angular.js onto skills by creating a project using that library.
To grow strong in current Javascript skills.
To create more Applications with React and Flutter (for android applications).

Projects

E-commerce website

This project is simple and i created using HTML, CSS and Javascript. There is limited functionality. The aim was to include advanced CSS knowledge. Making use of some CSS traits like transition that allows the site to change property values. In this case, it was to affect the images on the site. Therefore making the site responsive and attractive. This is for a furniture e-commerce store that allows users to select products.

The weather application was fun to make because of the implementation of Weather App API to display the weather of according to a city inserted in the input.

Spotify App

This App was fun to make. It includes a lot of styling using Bootstrap and includesa black background like the original Spotify App. Using client id and API from Spotify to access the token of the user. It is a one page layout with a nice scrolling attribute using custom SCSS.
